resources.string: Let system apps also use whitelist mode to align with third-party app behavior. All applications (including third-party applications and system applications) cannot be detected by default and need to be checked in the application list to be readable.
Displaying Hook notifications will trigger a Toast during the Hook process, which can aid in your debugging; however, this notification may cause the system to freeze during the Hook.
Allow not to remove account settings Device Administrator
Removed the limit on the number of recent task locks in ColorOS
Enter the app name or package name search

(Danger) may reduce stability. By default, system package names starting with \'android.\' are allowed to access accessibility services. After enabling this switch, it will also prevent them from accessing accessibility services.
Allows system components to be prevented from accessing accessibility
(调试功能)挂钩所有方法,方法被调用时输出日志
